#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int tc;
	cin>>tc;
	while(tc--)
	{
		int n;
		cin>>n;
		if(n==0)
		{
			cout<<0<<endl;
			continue;
		}
		  vector<pair<int, int> > vec;
		  vector<int> depart(n);
		  vector<int> arrive(n);
		  for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
          {
              cin>>arrive[i];
          }
          for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
          {
              cin>>depart[i];
          }
        for(int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
            vec.push_back(make_pair(arrive[i], 1));
            vec.push_back(make_pair(depart[i], 0));
        }

        sort(vec.begin(), vec.end());

        int curActive = 0;
        int maxAns = 0;
        for (int i = 0; i < vec.size(); i++) {
           if (vec[i].second == 1)
            {
               curActive++;
               maxAns = max(maxAns, curActive);
            } else {
                curActive--;
            }
        }
		cout<<maxAns<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
